name: assignPhoneToCallQueue
description:
After [buying phone number(s)](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360020808292#h_007ec8c2-0914-4265-8351-96ab23efa3ad), you can assign it, allowing callers to directly dial a number to reach a [call queue](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360021524831-Managing-Call-Queues).

**Prerequisites:**
* Pro or higher account plan. * Account owner or admin permissions * Zoom Phone license
**Scopes:** `phone:write:admin`
**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `Light`

callQueueId.description: Unique Identifier of the Call Queue.

phone_numbers.description: Provide either the `id` or the `number` field. Only a max of 5 numbers can be assigned to a call queue at a time.

id.description: Unique Identifier of the phone number.
